author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Another Monkey Punch Anime announced
body:
This could just be the title of one of the other anime mentioned by Dale, 
but I got this at http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/article.php?id=788 :

"Sham Neko ("Siam Cat")
Pased on Monkey Punch's MANGA of the same title.
Produced by Buyu, to be released on October the 6th."
